question: What changes would you like to see in San Francisco?
answer: I wish they would lower costs and provide more help, work together to make it nice and clean, and build more affordable housing for people in need.
source_text: but now its impossible I wish they they went to go down and more help and people would work together make it nice and clean because now its getting down because a lot of homeless people be nice if they can build more housing affordable housing for people they need
